name: guardian-of-alola
effect: Inflicts direct damage equal to ¾ of the target’s remaining HP.
short_effect: Damages the target for 75% of its remaining HP.

flavor_text.sun-moon: The user, the Land Spirit Pokémon, obtains Alola’s energy using its Z-Power and attacks the target with full force. This reduces the target’s HP greatly.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The user, the Land Spirit Pokémon, obtains Alola’s energy using its Z-Power and attacks the target with full force. This reduces the target’s HP greatly.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The user, the Land Spirit Pokémon, obtains Alola’s energy using its Z-Power and attacks the target with full force. This reduces the target’s HP greatly.
